verses.verse: It happened in the <S%H8147>twelfth<s%> <S%H8141>year,<s%> in the twelfth <S%H2320>month,<s%> in the <S%H259>first<s%> day of the <S%H2320>month,<s%> that the <S%H1697>word<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> came to <S%H559>me,<s%> saying,

<S%H1121>Son<s%> of <S%H120>man,<s%> take <S%H5375>up<s%> a <S%H7015>lamentation<s%> over <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> and <S%H559>tell<s%> <S%H1819>him,<s%> You were likened to a young <S%H3715>lion<s%> of the <S%H1471>nations:<s%> yet you are as a <S%H8577>monster<s%> in the <S%H3220>seas;<s%> and you broke <S%H1518>out<s%> with your <S%H5104>rivers,<s%> and <S%H1804>troubled<s%> the <S%H4325>waters<s%> with your <S%H7272>feet,<s%> and <S%H7515>fouled<s%> their <S%H5104>rivers.<s%>

Thus <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H136>Yahweh:<s%> I will spread <S%H6566>out<s%> my <S%H7568>net<s%> on you with a <S%H6951>company<s%> of <S%H7227>many<s%> <S%H5971>peoples;<s%> and they shall bring you <S%H5927>up<s%> in my <S%H2764>net.<s%>

I will <S%H5203>leave<s%> you on the <S%H776>land,<s%> I will cast you <S%H2904>forth<s%> on the <S%H6440>open<s%> <S%H7704>field,<s%> and will cause all the <S%H5775>birds<s%> of the <S%H8064>sky<s%> to <S%H7931>settle<s%> on <S%H7646>you,<s%> and I will satisfy the <S%H2416>animals<s%> of the whole earth with <S%H776>you.<s%>
I will <S%H5414>lay<s%> your <S%H1320>flesh<s%> on the <S%H2022>mountains,<s%> and <S%H4390>fill<s%> the <S%H1516>valleys<s%> with your <S%H7419>height.<s%>

I will also <S%H8248>water<s%> with your <S%H1818>blood<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> in which you <S%H6824>swim,<s%> even to the <S%H2022>mountains;<s%> and the <S%H650>watercourses<s%> shall be full of <S%H4390>you.<s%>

When I shall <S%H3518>extinguish<s%> <S%H3680>you,<s%> I will cover the <S%H8064>heavens,<s%> and <S%H6937>make<s%> its <S%H3556>stars<s%> <S%H6937>dark;<s%> I will <S%H3680>cover<s%> the <S%H8121>sun<s%> with a <S%H6051>cloud,<s%> and the <S%H3394>moon<s%> shall not <S%H215>give<s%> its <S%H216>light.<s%>

All the <S%H3974>bright<s%> <S%H216>lights<s%> of the <S%H8064>sky<s%> will I make <S%H6937>dark<s%> over <S%H5414>you,<s%> and set <S%H2822>darkness<s%> on your <S%H776>land,<s%> <S%H5002>says<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>Yahweh.<s%>

I will also <S%H3707>trouble<s%> the <S%H3820>hearts<s%> of <S%H7227>many<s%> <S%H5971>peoples,<s%> when I shall <S%H935>bring<s%> your <S%H7667>destruction<s%> among the <S%H1471>nations,<s%> into the <S%H776>countries<s%> which you have not <S%H3045>known.<s%>

<S%H7227>Yes,<s%> I will make many <S%H5971>peoples<s%> <S%H8074>amazed<s%> at <S%H4428>you,<s%> and their kings shall be <S%H8178>horribly<s%> <S%H8175>afraid<s%> for <S%H5774>you,<s%> when I shall brandish my <S%H2719>sword<s%> before <S%H6440>them;<s%> and they shall <S%H2729>tremble<s%> at every <S%H7281>moment,<s%> every <S%H376>man<s%> for his own <S%H5315>life,<s%> in the <S%H3117>day<s%> of your <S%H4658>fall.<s%>
For thus <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>Yahweh:<s%> The <S%H2719>sword<s%> of the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon<s%> shall come on <S%H935>you.<s%>

By the <S%H2719>swords<s%> of the <S%H1368>mighty<s%> will I cause your <S%H1995>multitude<s%> to <S%H5307>fall;<s%> the <S%H6184>terrible<s%> of the <S%H1471>nations<s%> are they <S%H7703>all:<s%> and they shall bring to nothing the <S%H1347>pride<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> and all its <S%H1995>multitude<s%> shall be <S%H8045>destroyed.<s%>

I will <S%H6>destroy<s%> also all its <S%H929>animals<s%> <S%H5921>from<s%> beside <S%H7227>many<s%> <S%H4325>waters;<s%> neither shall the <S%H7272>foot<s%> of <S%H120>man<s%> <S%H1804>trouble<s%> them any <S%H6541>more,<s%> nor the hoofs of <S%H929>animals<s%> trouble <S%H1804>them.<s%>

Then will I make their <S%H4325>waters<s%> <S%H8257>clear,<s%> and cause their <S%H5104>rivers<s%> to <S%H3212>run<s%> like <S%H8081>oil,<s%> <S%H5002>says<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>Yahweh.<s%>

When I shall <S%H5414>make<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> <S%H8077>desolate<s%> and <S%H776>waste,<s%> a land <S%H8074>destitute<s%> of that of which it was <S%H4393>full,<s%> when I shall <S%H5221>strike<s%> all those who <S%H3427>dwell<s%> <S%H3045>therein,<s%> then shall they know that I am <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>

This is the <S%H7015>lamentation<s%> with which they shall <S%H6969>lament;<s%> the <S%H1323>daughters<s%> of the <S%H1471>nations<s%> shall <S%H6969>lament<s%> <S%H4714>therewith;<s%> over Egypt, and over all her <S%H1995>multitude,<s%> shall they <S%H6969>lament<s%> <S%H5002>therewith,<s%> says the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>Yahweh.<s%>

It happened also in the <S%H8147>twelfth<s%> <S%H8141>year,<s%> in the <S%H2568>fifteenth<s%> day of the <S%H2320>month,<s%> that the <S%H1697>word<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> came to <S%H559>me,<s%> saying,

<S%H1121>Son<s%> of <S%H120>man,<s%> <S%H5091>wail<s%> for the <S%H1995>multitude<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> and cast them <S%H3381>down,<s%> even <S%H1323>her,<s%> and the daughters of the <S%H117>famous<s%> <S%H1471>nations,<s%> to the lower <S%H8482>parts<s%> of the <S%H776>earth,<s%> with those who go <S%H3381>down<s%> into the <S%H953>pit.<s%>
Whom do you pass in <S%H5276>beauty?<s%> Go <S%H3381>down,<s%> and be <S%H7901>laid<s%> with the <S%H6189>uncircumcised.<s%>

They shall <S%H5307>fall<s%> in the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of those who are <S%H2491>slain<s%> by the <S%H2719>sword:<s%> she is <S%H5414>delivered<s%> to the <S%H2719>sword;<s%> <S%H4900>draw<s%> her away and all her <S%H1995>multitudes.<s%>

The <S%H410>strong<s%> among the <S%H1368>mighty<s%> shall <S%H1696>speak<s%> to him out of the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of <S%H7585>Sheol<s%> with those who <S%H5826>help<s%> <S%H3381>him:<s%> they are gone down, they <S%H7901>lie<s%> <S%H6189>still,<s%> even the uncircumcised, <S%H2491>slain<s%> by the <S%H2719>sword.<s%>
<S%H804>Asshur<s%> is there and all her <S%H6951>company;<s%> her <S%H6913>graves<s%> are all <S%H5439>around<s%> <S%H2491>her;<s%> all of them slain, <S%H5307>fallen<s%> by the <S%H2719>sword;<s%>

whose <S%H6913>graves<s%> are <S%H5414>set<s%> in the <S%H3411>uttermost<s%> parts of the <S%H953>pit,<s%> and her <S%H6951>company<s%> is <S%H5439>around<s%> her <S%H6900>grave;<s%> all of them <S%H2491>slain,<s%> <S%H5307>fallen<s%> by the <S%H2719>sword,<s%> who <S%H5414>caused<s%> <S%H2851>terror<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of the <S%H2416>living.<s%>

There is <S%H5867>Elam<s%> and all her <S%H1995>multitude<s%> <S%H5439>around<s%> her <S%H6900>grave;<s%> all of them <S%H2491>slain,<s%> <S%H5307>fallen<s%> by the <S%H2719>sword,<s%> who are gone <S%H3381>down<s%> <S%H6189>uncircumcised<s%> into the lower <S%H8482>parts<s%> of the <S%H776>earth,<s%> who <S%H5414>caused<s%> their <S%H2851>terror<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of the <S%H2416>living,<s%> and have <S%H5375>borne<s%> their <S%H3639>shame<s%> with those who go <S%H3381>down<s%> to the <S%H953>pit.<s%>

They have <S%H5414>set<s%> her a <S%H4904>bed<s%> in the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of the <S%H2491>slain<s%> with all her <S%H1995>multitude;<s%> her <S%H6913>graves<s%> are <S%H5439>around<s%> <S%H6189>her;<s%> all of them uncircumcised, <S%H2491>slain<s%> by the <S%H2719>sword;<s%> for their <S%H2851>terror<s%> was <S%H5414>caused<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of the <S%H2416>living,<s%> and they have <S%H5375>borne<s%> their <S%H3639>shame<s%> with those who go <S%H3381>down<s%> to the <S%H953>pit:<s%> he is <S%H5414>put<s%> in the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of those who are <S%H2491>slain.<s%>

There is <S%H4902>Meshech,<s%> <S%H8422>Tubal,<s%> and all their <S%H1995>multitude;<s%> their <S%H6913>graves<s%> are <S%H5439>around<s%> <S%H6189>them;<s%> all of them uncircumcised, <S%H2490>slain<s%> by the <S%H2719>sword;<s%> for they <S%H5414>caused<s%> their <S%H2851>terror<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of the <S%H2416>living.<s%>

They shall not <S%H7901>lie<s%> with the <S%H1368>mighty<s%> who are <S%H5307>fallen<s%> of the <S%H6189>uncircumcised,<s%> who are gone <S%H3381>down<s%> to <S%H7585>Sheol<s%> with their <S%H3627>weapons<s%> of <S%H4421>war,<s%> and have <S%H5414>laid<s%> their <S%H2719>swords<s%> under their <S%H7218>heads,<s%> and their <S%H5771>iniquities<s%> are on their <S%H6106>bones;<s%> for they were the <S%H2851>terror<s%> of the <S%H1368>mighty<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of the <S%H2416>living.<s%>
But you shall be <S%H7665>broken<s%> in the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of the <S%H6189>uncircumcised,<s%> and shall <S%H7901>lie<s%> with those who are <S%H2491>slain<s%> by the <S%H2719>sword.<s%>

There is <S%H123>Edom,<s%> her <S%H4428>kings<s%> and all her <S%H5387>princes,<s%> who in their <S%H1369>might<s%> are <S%H5414>laid<s%> with those who are <S%H2491>slain<s%> by the <S%H2719>sword:<s%> they shall <S%H7901>lie<s%> with the <S%H6189>uncircumcised,<s%> and with those who go <S%H3381>down<s%> to the <S%H953>pit.<s%>

There are the <S%H5257>princes<s%> of the <S%H6828>north,<s%> all of <S%H6722>them,<s%> and all the Sidonians, who are gone <S%H3381>down<s%> with the <S%H2491>slain;<s%> in the <S%H2851>terror<s%> which they caused by their <S%H1369>might<s%> they are put to <S%H954>shame;<s%> and they <S%H7901>lie<s%> <S%H6189>uncircumcised<s%> with those who are <S%H2491>slain<s%> by the <S%H2719>sword,<s%> and <S%H5375>bear<s%> their <S%H3639>shame<s%> with those who go <S%H3381>down<s%> to the <S%H953>pit.<s%>

<S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> shall <S%H7200>see<s%> <S%H5162>them,<s%> and shall be comforted over all his <S%H1995>multitude,<s%> even <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> and all his <S%H2428>army,<s%> <S%H2491>slain<s%> by the <S%H2719>sword,<s%> <S%H5002>says<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>Yahweh.<s%>

For I have <S%H5414>put<s%> his <S%H2851>terror<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of the <S%H2416>living;<s%> and he shall be <S%H7901>laid<s%> in the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of the <S%H6189>uncircumcised,<s%> with those who are <S%H2491>slain<s%> by the <S%H2719>sword,<s%> even <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> and all his <S%H1995>multitude,<s%> <S%H5002>says<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>Yahweh.<s%>
